column2: Among 10 randomly picked countries *whose electricity consumption is less than 620 million kWh*, how many won one or more medals in the last Olympics?
Among 10 randomly picked countries *whose electricity consumption is less than 620 million kWh*, estimate how many won one or more medals in the last Olympics.
Among 10 randomly picked countries *whose electricity consumption is less than 620 million kWh*, estimate how many won one or more medals in the last Olympics. Give your best guess.

If a country's electricity consumption is less than 620 million kWh, what is the chance (or probability) that it won at least one gold medal in the last Olympics? Give your best guess (between 0 and 1).
Given 10 randomly picked countries *whose electricity consumption is less than 620 million kWh*, how many won at least one medal in the last Olympics? Make a guess (between 0 and 10).
Among 10 randomly picked countries *whose electricity consumption is less than 620 million kWh*, guess (from 0 to 10) how many won at least one medal in the last Olympics?
Given a country *whose electricity consumption is less than 620 million kWh*, estimate the probability of winning at least one gold medal in the last Olympics.
